mapper.sql: INORDER_ID, PK_SOBOOKS, LDATE, BILLCODE, SUPPLIER_ID, USER_ID, WAREHOUSE_ID, ALLAMOUNT, BILLTYPE, BILLSTATUS, PAIDAMOUNT, UNPAIDAMOUNT, THISPAY, SUBBRANCH, NOTE, ISSETTLEMENTED
mapper.select: select a.ALLAMOUNT,b.PNUMBER,c.GOODNAME , GOODPIC ,c.GOODCODE,a.BILLTYPE from psi_inorder as a left join psi_inorder_body as b on a.INORDER_ID=b.INORDER_ID left join base_good as c on b.GOODCODE_ID=c.GOODCODE where TO_DAYS(a.CREATETIME) = TO_DAYS(NOW()) and a.PK_SOBOOKS=#{PK_SOBOOKS} and IFNULL(a.dr,0)=0

select b.GOODCODE,b.GOODNAME, b.GOODSPECIF ,b.RPRICE, c.NAME as UNIT,a.PNUMBER,a.AMOUNT,d.WHNAME,a.NOTE from psi_inorder_body as a left join base_good as b on a.GOODCODE_ID=b.GOODCODE left join cp_spunit as c on c.SPUNIT_ID = b.CUNIT_ID left join base_warehouse as d on a.WAREHOUSE_ID=d.WAREHOUSE_ID where a.PK_SOBOOKS=#{PK_SOBOOKS} and IFNULL(a.dr,0)=0 and a.INORDER_ID=#{INORDER_ID}
